title: child process
extract: A child process is the creation of a parent process, which can be defined as the main process that creates child or subprocesses to perform certain operations. Each process can have many child processes but only one parent. A child process inherits most of its parent's attributes.
extract_html: A child process is the creation of a parent process, which can be defined as the main process that creates child or subprocesses to perform certain operations. Each process can have many child processes but only one parent. A child process inherits most of its parent's attributes.
